LayoutNode.Content: Highlights Steel freestyle frame and Unicrown fork for durable riding Single-speed drivetrain for simple, carefree riding Front and rear caliper brakes with alloy brake levers for crisp, precise stopping; rear coaster brake BMX handlebar with 4-bolt steel stem keeps the rider in control 60H fan spoke wheels are durable and provide a rad, unique look
LayoutNode.SRC:
Highlights

Steel freestyle frame and Unicrown fork for durable ridingSingle-speed drivetrain for simple, carefree ridingFront and rear caliper brakes with alloy brake levers for crisp, precise stopping; rear coaster brakeBMX handlebar with 4-bolt steel stem keeps the rider in control60H fan spoke wheels are durable and provide a rad, unique look

LayoutNode.Content: *Free assembly for all store and order pick up purchases for bikes 20” and up! He will fly like and eagle on his new Schwinn Falcon. The Schwinn Falcon is a perfect match for a rider 7 to 13 years old, 48" to 60 inches tall that is growing fast andready for a bigger bike and will appreciate the simplicity of an easy handling bike. The Schwinn Falcon is simple to ride because of the single speed and the coasterbrake with additional front and rear hand brakes. (this is perfect for a rider transitioning from a coaster brake only bike). The seat height adjusts with a tool free leverfor raises needed from season to season. The important thing to remember about the Falcon is that it is a Schwinn SmartStart bike. This means that it is part of the family of bikes that was designed to fit achild's proportions. The seats are designed to support a child's size. Grips are sized smaller for small hands. The geometry matches pedal width to a child's hip width.This all means a more enjoyable, less wobbly, more comfortable ride for your child. And don't forget, like all Schwinn bikes the Falcon has a limited lifetime warranty foras long as you own the bike. They will enjoy the freedom of riding on a Schwinn Falcon a SmartStart bike. show more

LayoutNode.Content: Great little bike (would recommend) Diane V — 1 year ago verified purchaser This is a gorgeous looking bike. The red rims are awesome. The seat is well padded and comfortable. It is well built and looks sturdy - the tires are wide and the handlebars are in a good spot. This is from a line that Schwinn has developed for kids who are just learning to ride.
